QuestData.Title: A Monument to Vengeance
QuestData.Description:
<Corpses of Ebon Blade knights litter the Crucible of the Damned, displaying the aftermath of your first foray into this desolate place.
Their sacrifice should not be forgotten.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Ebon Runeblades and build a monument to the Ebon Blade's sacrifice in the Crucible of the Damned.
QuestData.RewardText:
<The Ebon Blade monument radiates with energy from the fallen knights' runeblades.
It is a small tribute to their sacrifice, but it will have to do.>
